doc.field: Lewis L. Delafield, Eugene D. Hawkins and affiliated attorneys records
Lewis L. Delafield, Eugene D. Hawkins and affiliated attorneys records

These two boxes held a variety of loose materials that are difficult to sort out. Much/most of the two bundles appears to relate to Lily Alys Godfrey v. Stephen A. Dutton, et al, with other names that seem related to the matter being Ezra Sterling, Lorin Blodget, and Warner, among others, ca. 1890s. (See D&L box 74 for a possibly related deposition of a Mrs. Benson.) Other perceived matters are: 1) Emerald and Phoenix Brewing Company of New York v. Marcella Costigan, New York State, ca. 1895. 2) Auto-Electric Company stock certificate to Benjamin Gould, 1900. 3) People of the State of New York v. Simeon W. Dutton (this seems unrelated to the Stephen A. Dutton matter), ca. 1896.
Lewis L. Delafield, Eugene D. Hawkins and affiliated attorneys records
Series I. Boxes labeled D-L (Delafield-Longfellow) >> Subseries I.A. Work Files >> D & L Boxes 84.1, 84.2
